name: Unassorted Dreamers Demo
description:
A brief demo for a character-driven bullet hell dream exploration game I'm currently working on for Windows.

CONTROLS/TIPS:
- Press F4 to fullscreen
- Hold Z to shoot at enemies
- Holding SHIFT will let you focus, which slows you down and reveals your hitbox!
- Releasing X will perform a strike attack, which clears light bullets when charged. Though it charges on its own, holding X allows it to charge faster.
- Pressing C will use up a burst, clearing the screen of all light bullets and making you invincible for a short time.

Sweet dreams!
